medical_history.chief_complaint: An increasing number of skin tags.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The skin tags began appearing over the past 4 to 5 years, with the family concerned about their increasing number. They were asymptomatic.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Congenital hydrocephalus, mandibular jaw cysts, borderline mental retardation, and a learning disability.
medical_history.family_history: Two maternal aunts appear unaffected; a maternal uncle with jaw cysts; the mother reported a family history of jaw cyst issues and her own mother died of liver cirrhosis.
